Title: Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo
Director: Mahiro Maeda, Masayuki, Kazuya Tsurumaki, Hideaki Anno
Actors: Megumi Ogata, Megumi Hayashibara, Yûko Miyamura, Maaya Sakamoto
Plot: 14 years have passed since the near third impact. Most of the world has changed except Shinji Ikari who awakens, unaged in a new and strange environment. Misato has formed a group that has is separate from Nerv. The fight is far from over but the biggest struggle might be against humans and former allies.
